text: hello, what is your opinion about charities?
It depends on the charity.
todays charity is called save the children.
What is it and what does it do?
they help children around the world and in usa , do you want more details?
Yes I would appreciate more details.
They help the children by providing them with food, clothes, medical care, shelter and school them.
Do you know who the head of the charity is?
no i dont know him, but they are very transparent.
How much of every donation, percentage wise, go for administrative costs?
10% usually, if some extra money is needed for casual events they take 15%.
That's pretty high if you ask me.  Do you have numbers on how many children they help a year?
they helped last year 2 million children, they now are helping Hawaii with the hurricane .
I didn't know Hawaii's kids were impacted.  What are they doing to help them?
in this case they are helping everyone who is affected, They provide food and all kind of resources .
So, it's not just kids they help?
no they help just kids but now they are helping everyone who is in Hawaii. i have to ask, are you willing to donate today?
I might be willing to donate a very small amount.
thank you for you kindness , if you want in the end of the survey you can donate.
I will donate .03 cents.
